title: Ring Out The Bells
lyrics:
10 Contributors
Ring Out The Bells Lyrics
[Intro: Sarah Connor]
Mm
[Verse 1: Sarah Connor]
I can't help it, I love it
Every year my heart skips a beat
When the Christmas street lights
Go on for the first time, mm
Mm, children skate on frozen lakes
Then run to the winter fires
Watch them burn in the air tonight
Makin' even bad spirits bright
[Pre-Chorus: Sarah Connor]
People rushin' through the city, getting things done
Like it's the end of all times
And I wonder why they're stressin' out about it
Raise your glass and drink to the fun, oh
Now everyone just
[Chorus: Sarah Connor]
Ring out the bells
Let's just keep the night rockin' 'til Santa comes knockin'
All 'round the world
There'll be mistletoe kissin', everyone's wishin'
On a star leading the way
From here to New Year's Day, let's celebrate
And keep the night rockin'
Keep it rockin', ring out the bells



[Post-Chorus: Sarah Connor]
Hoo, hoo-hoo, hoo
Ring out the bells
Hoo, hoo-hoo, hoo, hoo-hoo
[Verse 2: Sarah Connor]
Hang a star at the door, dance slow to Nat King Cole
Tellin' tales from times before
And toast to the ones that we lost
Come inside and get warm, there's laughter and songs
And friends around
And now we're blowin' up the radio
And everybody singin' "Let It Snow," oh-oh-oh
[Pre-Chorus: Sarah Connor]
People rushin' through the city, getting things done
Like it's the end of all times
And I wonder why they're stressin' out about it
Raise your glass and drink to the fun, oh
Now everyone just
[Chorus: Sarah Connor]
Ring out the bells
Let's just keep the night rockin' 'til Santa comes knockin'
All 'round the world
There'll be mistletoe kissin', everyone's wishin'
On a star leading the way
From here to New Year's Day, let's celebrate
And keep the night rockin'
Keep it rockin', ring out the bells



[Post-Chorus: Sarah Connor]
Hoo, hoo-hoo, hoo
Ring out the bells
Hoo, hoo-hoo, hoo, hoo-hoo
[Bridge: Sarah Connor & 
Choir
, 
Both
]
We're gonna ring out the bells, we're gonna ring out the bells
We're gonna ring 'em, ooh, ooh, ooh
We're gonna ring out (
Ooh-ooh, ring out the bells
)
We're gonna ring out (
We're gonna ring out the bells
)
Oh (
We're gonna ring 'em
), say 
ooh, ooh, ooh
We're gonna
 
ring out the bells
, 
we're gonna
 
ring out the bells
We're gonna ring 'em, ooh, ooh, ooh
 (Oh, oh-oh, oh, oh-oh, oh)
[Chorus: Sarah Connor]
Ring out the bells
Let's just keep the night rockin' 'til Santa comes knockin'
All 'round the world
There'll be mistletoe kissin', everyone's wishin'
On a star leading the way
From here to New Year's Day, let's celebrate
And keep the night rockin'
Keep it rockin', ring out the bells
[Post-Chorus: Sarah Connor]
Oh! Hoo, hoo-hoo, hoo
Say ring out the bells
(Hoo, hoo-hoo, hoo, hoo-hoo) Ring out the bells
album: Not So Silent Night (The Cozy Edition)
